attributes.additional_details: The middle class people are mainly affected as wealthy citizens have their own expensive cars and planes for transport. It is the workers and middle class people who are being expolited by these monster campanies.
attributes.background: To Take over the train services all over the country from these greedy companies that are expoliting the populace. A return juorney from Scunthorpe to Heathrow costs £262. Flight to Spain is much cheaper.

rejection.details:
The government is bringing most passenger train operators under public ownership. Nationalisation will start in 2025 and is expected to finish in 2027.

More information: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/when-will-my-local-train-operator-be-nationalised/
